Definition: Given an English language product review, you need to output whether it is a Good Review or a Bad Review. A good review is one where the product's review has positive tone. A Bad review is one where the tone of product's review is negative.

Positive Examples.input: The sound seems really good but sometimes it cuts in and out which is annoying. You have to put the cord directly into your ipod. Other than that, its a simple design with nothing fancy. I love how cheap they were for 10 dollars... But overall nice design... No one can steal me earphones. lol thanks again amazon.
Positive Examples.explanation: Here the review is good because it has positvie tone as the reviewer suggested it really likes the sound and the output is also Good Review.So this example is positive example

Positive Examples.input: My son received this book as a gift. I was extremely disappointed. It is an old book, and the print quality and size are unreadable. At age 4, my 2 year old needs visual help to identify parts of his body at play. Maybe it would be OK for an older child with better sight. But don't waste your time or money. Go buy the new version called "Brain Power--Make Sense Of Opposites" instead.
Positive Examples.explanation: Here the review is Bad because it has negative tone as suggested in the product review that the user is disappointed by the product and the output is also Bad review. So this example is positive example

Negative Examples.input: This is a terrific product. It does exactly as advertised and it was much less expensive here than at the store. Easy to attach & adjust both cameras from one DVR. We are buying 4 more of these for our other cameras. It looks like security personnel will now start to see us more often because they know how easy it is. Only drawback I could possibly come up with is that it's so sturdy we wonder if it needs some sort of tether attached to it. But no - it doesn't.
Negative Examples.explanation: Here the review is Good review as there is positive tone in the sentence but it has been output as Bad Review so this example is negative

Negative Examples.input: This thing is so cheap that I had to send it back; don't buy. The screen doesn't reflect anything of it's own size on the wall. It has an extremely light blue hue and looks nothing like any normal light fixture. Not even close to as bright or crisp looking in person & obviously very CHEAP made. Just pay a little more for something better. You will be completely satisfied with this product.
Negative Examples.explanation: Here the review is Bad review as there is negtvie tone in the sentence but it has been output as Good Review so this example is negative

Instances.input: This story just never gets into the heads of either characters. She says she isn't going to say his name, but does after we are almost 1/3 through book. Then she makes a very odd scene on their honeymoon where he is being really mean, and doesn't do anything wrong. I'm not sure if this was because it has been so long since they have sex, or maybe not.

The game will try to load and then just hang up the game. I have tried everything to resolve this problem. Sometimes you can get it loaded but sometimes not. This is a great computer game, however, if all of the parts are faulty how do they expect people using computers with high specs to play it. There seems no way that this game was tested on an older PC before releasing for purchase. At least it didn't work when I tried.

We are still waiting to hear from Mr. Eden's office, but have now been on hold for more than 30 minutes. The office is closed. I would not expect this level of incompetence anywhere in the world. If there is, one has heard it all - except North Korea. At any rate, do you want a product that will cost you nearly $31,000 and last less than two years?As far as I'm concerned they should be able to fix it. And if not, I'll give them my $35.
This vacuum cleaner looks great. It has plenty power.
My cat loves these. The problem with them is that they are extremely hard plastic, making no amount of crunching sound like kitty toys should make.
The product does not disappoint. It gives off plenty of light.

I bought the product in late March 2011 for my Dell Vostro 1500. One month later it started making a loud noise. The sound was so bad that I had to shut down every morning and leave open the laptop bag before turning on my computer. It is now early August 2013 and only time will tell if this noise means premature death or not. Either way, one month beyond warranty period, Toshiba does not stand behind their product. DO NOT BUY.

Well I bought this book because it's all in one place and it looks like they have added a lot of extra stuff to it, but now that buying these books, you get tired of them. What is so disappointing with the other books are the same things I've always felt about the ones I've bought. The artwork isn't spectacular or anything and there really aren't any new insights from artists who actually worked on Marvel during this time.
